page.title: 12Plants of Papa Westray
page.content: The island has 230 species of plants,fresh water plants show the influence of salt spray.The lochs have pond weed and Crowfoot,the latter grows close to the sea.Near the lochs and in wet fields are Yellow Flag,Canary Grass and Meadowsweet. South of the loch there is a stretch of fen with Parnassus Grass,Ragged Robin,Meadow orchids and numerous rushes and mosses.To the north is a Blanket Bog with Spagnum Moss,Bog Asphodel and Cotton Grass.It is the largest Maritime Heath in Orkney, and on it is to be found Sedges,Heather Crowberry,Bucks Horn,Meadow Rue and a single Allseed.The Primula Scotica can also be seen on the island. Other plants are Bell Heather,Mountain Everlasting,Various Lichens,Hearts Ease Pansies,Felwort,Eye Bright Wild Thyme,Adders Tongue and Spleenwort.
